CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 2, 1962, pg. 13, reads: "His Day - The City of Pittsburgh officially proclaimed last Saturday at 'Adam Wade Day.' Shown at ceremonies in Mayor's office are left to right: Mrs. Henry Wade Jr., Keith Wade, Henry Wade, the father of the honoree; J. Craig Kuhn, City Councilman, and acting Mayor of the city; Adam Wade, Mrs. A. Wade, Mrs. Earsley F. Kincaid, Mrs. Delgratia Allen, Mrs. Lillian Mauney, Henry Wade Sr. and Mrs. Alberta Mason. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Henry Wade, Keith Wade, Mrs. Wade, acting Mayor of Pittsburgh J. Craig Kuhn, Adam Wade, Mrs. A. Wade, and Henry Wade Sr., posed in Office of Mayor for "Adam Wade Day"
